Sinopse: Deke (Denzel Washington), a burnt-out Kern County, CA deputy sheriff teams up with Baxter (Rami Malek), a crack LASD detective, to nab a serial killer. Meanwhile, Deke must wrestle with a dark secret from his past.—cochiseledoux
